DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Motion Control Technique Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify an additional therapy-related action related to the method of managing movement in the treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the method of managing movement in the treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act or process of changing position or place; the change in position of a body part.:The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.:A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

Concepts.definition: The act or process of changing position or place; the change in position of a body part.
The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.
A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify or list an additional therapy-related action, procedure, or event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.

DataElement.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
